President Gerald R. Ford Clubhouse

La Quinta

Open today 2:00pm - 7:00pm

President Gerald R. Ford Boys & Girls Club (La Quinta) opened in 1994 and dedicated to President Ford with a ceremony attended by General Colin Powell. This clubhouse is a great space that youth have been coming together after school for over two decades.
